page.title: 14Local Newspapers
page.content: The newspapers in this area are not specifically for Costock,they are for Loughborough and the surrounding villages.The main papers in our area are the{Loughborough News,Loughborough {Echo,Loughborough and Coalville {Trader,Nottingham Evening Post}and{ {Echo Extra.} The Evening Post is mainly about Nottingham,about 80% are adverts,the price is 17p but 14p if delivered.The Loughborough News,a free paper,is about 65% adverts.The news items concern just the Loughborough area.The Loughborough and Coalville Trader is a free paper,it is 75% adverts.The Loughborough Echo is mainly news with quite a few adverts,it costs 15p.The Echo Extra is a thin paper full of adverts,it is free.
